name: MTSW Mini Maverick Switchless Wah
details:
Mini Wah Pedal. SwitchlessA great-sounding wah pedal and a whole lot of extra room on your pedalboard. That's what you get with the Morley Maverick Wah pedal. With all the classic sweep of Morley’s full-sized version, this mini pedal puts it in a package that allows you to fit more pedals into your rig. And it’s equipped with Morley’s switchless control, Electro-optical circuitry, and cold-rolled steel housing for rock-solid operation. Grab the Maverick Mini Wah from Sweetwater, and you’ll get the best of Morley with room to spare.
Morley Mini Maverick Wah Pedal Features:
Guitar wah pedal
Miniature pedal enclosure
Switchless design offers quick and simple operation
Electro-optical circuitry for dependable operation
Rugged cold-rolled steel housing
